definition: clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: The company spend billions on souped-up broadband services.
sentences.chinese: 公司投资数十亿用来提高宽带网的服务质量。

sentences.english: China is set to reshape its government-funded public institutions to improve public services.
sentences.chinese: 为提高公共服务质量，我国将对事业单位进行整改。

sentences.english: EBN has markedly promoted the improvement of nursing quality.
sentences.chinese: 循证护理指导临床实践明显改善了护理服务质量。

sentences.english: Ensuring of service standards during operations and also to give training and guidance.
sentences.chinese: 确保服务质量，并做好员工培训及指导工作。

sentences.english: Service quality is the lifeline of business etiquette.
sentences.chinese: 服务质量是礼仪公司经营的生命线。

sentences.english: Many regular customers have noticed that the service in this restaurant is in decline.
sentences.chinese: 许多老主顾都感觉到了这家饭店的服务质量每况愈下。

sentences.english: The business philosophy of responsibility and good faith ensure our service quality.
sentences.chinese: 负责任和诚信的经营理念保证了我们的服务质量。

sentences.english: This ownership allows someone to be responsible to maintain the nonfunctional qualities of your services.
sentences.chinese: 此所有关系使得有人负责维护非功能性服务质量。

sentences.english: At present, there are neither more studies done on the express delivery service quality problem home or abroad, nor related study literatures.
sentences.chinese: 目前国内外关于快递业服务质量问题的研究并不多见。

sentences.english: The well-managed status of the maintenance spare parts warehouse is the key to guarantee the technical service quality.
sentences.chinese: 合理管理维修零件仓库是保证技术服务质量的关键。

sentences.english: Objective To strengthen the foreign language magazine construction, and to heighten the information service quality of foreign language.
sentences.chinese: 目的加强图书馆外刊建设，提高外文信息服务质量。

sentences.english: Quality of Service in Mobile Ad hoc Networks has been one of hot topics.
sentences.chinese: 服务质量是移动自组网络研究的热点问题之一。

sentences.english: But the quality assessment for the library of electronic services is less.
sentences.chinese: 而针对图书馆电子服务质量评估的研究还很少。

sentences.english: Our service has been very well-received by our customers so far.
sentences.chinese: 到现在为止，顾客对我们的服务质量评价很高。

sentences.english: The group groused about the service in the hotel .
sentences.chinese: 旅游团对这家饭店的服务质量抱怨颇多。

sentences.english: The final judges of the tourism service quality are the customers.
sentences.chinese: 旅游企业服务质量的优劣，最终的评判者是顾客。

definition: environmental sanitation/abbr. to 環衛|环卫[huan2 wei4]
